title: HOUR 3- Jovan Buha and Jeff Pearlman Sep 30, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 3- Jovan Buha and Jeff Pearlman Sep 30, 2020
description:
Jovan Buha gives Dan a look behind the curtain with the Los Angeles Clippers and Doc Rivers. Jovan says that there was a difference in philosophy and that it was simply about wins and loses. Jeff Pearlman tells Dan that Shaq wanted a big brother relationship with Kobe, but that Kobe wanted none of that.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Jovan Buha gives Dan a look behind the curtain with the Los Angeles Clippers and Doc Rivers. Jovan says that there was a difference in philosophy and that it was simply about wins and loses. Jeff Pearlman tells Dan that Shaq wanted a big brother relationship with Kobe, but that Kobe wanted none of that.
